		Question: who is michael buble
		Answer:
answer: The answer is: Michael Bublé, a Canadian singer and actor. He was born in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada, on 9 September 1975. He has sold over 75 million records worldwide, and has won four Grammy Awards. He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, and is a member of the Order of Canada, He is also a supporter of the Make-A-Wish Foundation and a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador.
